Html:
I'm evaluating Composite Application Guidance for purposes of recommending (or not) to a client of mine.  I've used other composite frameworks with success (WCSF, WSSF), and I'm leaning toward recommending CAL.  The client is wondering about the adoption level of CAL.  Specifically, are there any lists of real-life examples, or a portfolio of applications / companies using the Composite Application Guidance for line of business apps?  Such a list/portfolio would really help as a selling point for CAL.

Thanks,

Dave

Hi Dave,

Blaine Wastell, Prism PM, recently blogged about some customers using Prism. If you require further information about Prism’s adoption, you could drop him a comment in his blog or contact him through his codeplex user.

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
Thanks Damian.  I did read Blaine's post, and found it helpful.  I was hoping for a few more references, but I'll drop a note on Blaine's blog and see if he can assist further.
